snippet: In the shooting death last month of Chavis Carter in the back seat of a patrol car in Arkansas, the police showed new dashboard camera video and witness interviews to try to address questions and criticism.
abstract: In the shooting death last month of Chavis Carter in the back seat of a patrol car in Arkansas, the police showed new dashboard camera video and witness interviews to try to address questions and criticism.

headline.main: Arkansas Police Release More Footage Related to Man's Death
